fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Automotive industry 
- Internal market, Industry, Entrepreneurship and SME: TCMV + MVWG : Framework Regulation

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Selling, designing / developing, manufacturing, installation and aftercare of buses, coaches and derivative vehicles for vehicles with a self-supporting Van Hool construction and car body by Van Hool built on a set of other brands. 
Selling, designing / developing, manufacturing installation and aftercare of industrial vehicles such as trailers, trailers, tank and silo trucks, containers, building and static structures.
